content.raw:
Oh, I thought that since we would be running on an AWS EC2 instance, that would mean we all had accounts and could run the instance.  In fact, I thought that part of being in Phase 2 was that each team would be given access to an amazon EC2 server.

In any case, thanks for listening to the idea and explaining in more detail the reasoning.
content.html:
Oh, I thought that since we would be running on an AWS EC2 instance, that would mean we all had accounts and could run the instance. In fact, I thought that part of being in Phase 2 was that each team would be given access to an amazon EC2 server.

In any case, thanks for listening to the idea and explaining in more detail the reasoning.
